Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: It sounds like this person may have an unhealthy effect on you at this point in time. Not saying they are *necessarily* a bad person...just that the interaction seems to have a marked negative effect on your mental health right now. You might think about limiting or eliminating contact for a time.  Relapse sometimes happens, but it can also be recovered from. A few months from now this period of ED thoughts/behaviors could be a blip on the radar. If you have a support person you feel comfortable being open with, or a therapist, you might let them know what’s going on. EDs feed off of secrets and lies. Having an open discussion about what’s happening sometimes can lessen their power. Wishing you the best.
